event.title: was founded by Agustinian friars in 1625

data.event: San Esteban was founded by Agustinian friars in 1625, but was always attached to Nueva Coveta (present-day Burgos) and to the municipality of Santiago until 1911.

event.title: was always attached to Nueva Coveta (present-day Burgos) and to the municipality of Santiago until 1911
